replies.body:
The errors I see in the rito posts are OP they will never cease to amaze me :^)
pls fix the first rule it says
Your must:
not
You must:
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
thanks for the find will fix that up tomorrow.

This is probably gunna get me banned.... there are now two spaces between "You" and "must"
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Can I do Graves with a cigar?
yes
maybe i can do one on all the new skins illaoi's gotten since her release.........oh wait.
Master rules - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/contest-master-rules

Just double checking to see if you guys got my entry {{champion:76}} and if it was okay :P (It's an animated gif so im paranoid about it being too long lol, im pretty sure it's under 3 seconds tho but just double checking with you to be sure) I've never animated anything before so i hope its good haha

here is my entry in case it didnt register: 

http://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/f464fb78-8285-11e7-b820-ff85aed113f5.gif
that's cool, I like that {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
we have it, thanks though

Also here is a bigger (10x) version bc when i zoom it it gets blurry: 

http://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/75951419-8286-11e7-8107-ff85aed113f5.gif
It says we can only submit pngs or jpgs, does that mean we can't have any gifs?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=KY4p4EOX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-08-01T08:43:19.712+0000)
>
> We will accept it as long as it is max 128 x 128 pixels

maraudaur's previous reply abt submitting gifs
If you upload a public version I can cross reference it with the one we have in submissions.
http://imgur.com/354QLdu

Weird... I did it on photoshop on a 128x128 pixel canvas but when I save it as a jpeg or png it becomes blurry? did the submission come out ok or is it blurry for you as well?(when you zoom in)  

edit: I uploaded a zoomed in version which is a bigger size if thats ok
Can you upload the 128 x 128 version as well please?
The judges are gonna zoom in right? bc I'm using a 128x128 canvas but the art itself is much smaller so I'm worried they might not be able to see it?
Correct. We plan on blowing up the image =D or maybe we will squint a lot =P
I've submit my work :)!  But i'm not sure if my summoner name is acceptable haha... :/
I guess we will see =P
Need to clarify. When you say 128x128 pixels, is that each pixel in the artwork or the actual size of the picture when it is submitted?
Rip Maraudaur answering "It must be recognizable as League of Legends" over and over again. {{item:3070}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

if we do a gif how long can it be?
also can have more than one entry to increase our chance of winning?
Will this be announced in a new board or on this one?
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/HH5hGdKE winners announce here.

I've uploaded an entry, but the link to share doesn't seem to be working... :/
http://woobox.com/t74rr7/gallery/9jfoVNW5bFg --> just takes me to the main 'submit an entry' page

http://imgur.com/a/k0yW5

I'm hoping it still registered my entry!

Edit: just saw the previous post that it's because the gallery isn't open yet. I'll assume it submitted ok, then...
We have your submission =D
Cheers thanks!
Did my submission come out blurry coz in the submission preview it was all bleh. I assume its just the preview resizing it and stuff but ive been paranoid all day now :(
We have your submission =D its all good.

Is it too late to submit an entry? I wanted to submit one but I was 10 mins late before the entry form went offline as I did not realise what the time is in AEST coz I live in WA :( 
I sent an email last night to Riot support to see if they could help me out but it was not possible :(
Where is the submission form, I can't seem to find it.
Just wanted to check to see if you got and accepted my submission. Thanks
we got your submission =D
Just submitted mine! I've blown it up to x3. Hope that's okay!
please submit a 128x128 version as well.
Re-submitted a 128x128 ver named accordingly!
Hi! I sent in two Images because the former was a .jpg and was of lower quality, the second is a .png which is of higher quality. Just wondering which one is going to be judged xD
If its a duplicate entry we will judge the most recent image.
I accidentally sent in an illegal entry please delete it as soon as possible. Will reply with a link of it if needed.

I submitted mine but when it showed what i submitted it cut stuff off the top and bottom, even though my image says its 128 by 128. Really confused can you tell me if its got the bottom and top part of my picture, you can tell if you see a snail at the bottom and a black silhouette flying up top
